metadata.commander_name: Général de Division Joseph de Goislard de Monsabert

narrative.title: Algerian March Division - 1943Q1
narrative.situation: French Colonial Infantry Division (Algerian) deployed in North Africa during 1943Q1.
narrative.axis_objective: Hold current positions and prevent Allied breakthrough.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and neutralize Axis defensive positions.

weather.seasonal_impacts: Winter rainy season creates mud challenges. Wadis become impassable after storms. Limited vegetation provides little cover.
weather.environmental_challenges: Dust storms, vehicle bogging in mud, cold weather impacts on North African troops unaccustomed to winter conditions, malaria in lowland areas

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

environment.environmental_challenges: Dust storms, vehicle bogging in mud, cold weather impacts on North African troops unaccustomed to winter conditions, malaria in lowland areas
